message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $11,500. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a valuable asset that is worth more than its face value to you. I believe this price reflects the true worth of the product while allowing us both to benefit from the transaction.

Thanks for the offer Alice, but I'm looking to pay a bit less. I'm willing to offer $10,500 for the product. This price is still fair and allows us both to make a good deal.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. In light of your proposal, I am able to consider a price of $11,000 for the product. This still allows us both to achieve a satisfactory outcome, with a price that reflects the value of the product while remaining competitive.
